position1.context: This person is in the middle of a battlefield where ideas and egos collide.

position2.upright: There's competition, playful friction, or too much raw energy in your sex life. This can indicate passionate and energetic sexuality, but it can also turn into a conflict. The collision of different desires.
position2.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates avoidance of sexual conflict, repressed desire, or sexual fatigue. Competition has given way to reluctance.
position2.context: Your sexuality is a playful yet chaotic space where energies and desires collide.

position3.upright: There is competition, friction, or a clash of different energies in your emotional connection. This can be a passionate dynamic, but it is also spiritually draining. It takes effort to understand each other.
position3.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates that you are experiencing an internal conflict or are avoiding an emotional battle. This creates repressed tension.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection is a field of energetic chaos where different ideas and passions collide.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will be in constant conflict, competition and friction. This is an exhausting dynamic that drains your energy.
position4.reversed: The Five of Wands reversed indicates that avoiding a major conflict in the long run and sweeping problems under the carpet will end the relationship. The pent-up tension explodes.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a never-ending war with no winners.

position1.upright: This person has achieved success, received recognition, and is enjoying the victory. He has high self-confidence and is supported by those around him. He may see you as a part of his victory.
position1.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates that this person has experienced a defeat, is feeling unappreciated, or has lost self-confidence. Its success may be temporary or spurious.
position1.context: This person is a hero who won his fight and celebrates his victory in front of the public.

position2.upright: A satisfying and successful sexual life. Partners please each other and this increases self-confidence. Appreciation of sexual performance and feeling of victory.
position2.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates a feeling of failure, performance anxiety, or lack of appreciation in sexual life. One party's ego crushing the other.
position2.context: Your physical connection is a successful conquest where both parties feel victorious.

position3.upright: You support each other emotionally and celebrate your successes. There is a sense of triumph and appreciation among you. This is a motivating spiritual connection that increases self-confidence.
position3.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates that there is a lack of recognition between you or one party is jealous of the other's success. Spiritual support is lacking.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is two allies who honor each other and carry each other to victory.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a shared victory and a successful relationship that is appreciated by society. Together you will shine and gain self-confidence.
position4.reversed: The Six of Wands reversed indicates a relationship that will end in long-term failure or one party overshadowing the other. A decline in public opinion.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is a brilliant victory that everyone will envy.

position1.upright: This person is bravely defending something he believes in or his position. He may be struggling alone against difficulties and competition. He tries to protect his own space and boundaries in the relationship.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Wands indicates that this person has given up the fight, admitted defeat, or is feeling overwhelmed. His defenses may have been broken.
position1.context: This person is a warrior alone on the hill, fighting against those below for what he believes in.

position2.upright: A state of sexual self-defense or maintaining boundaries. Resistance from one party to the sexual approaches of the other. A passionate challenge or sexual struggle.
position2.reversed: Reversed Seven of Wands, defeat in a sexual struggle, loss of sexual self-confidence, or feeling vulnerable. The fatigue felt when limits are exceeded.
position2.context: Your sexual energy is a struggle in which someone passionately defends their space and desires.

position3.upright: You defend this emotional bond together against external factors or challenges. There is a courageous spiritual partnership between you, fighting for the values ​​you believe in.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Wands indicates that you are feeling emotionally overwhelmed by external pressures or have given up advocating for each other. You are spiritually tired.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond is an unshakable fortress that stands together against difficulties.

position4.upright: In the long run, you will need to constantly defend your relationship against external factors and challenges. This is a tiring but potentially successful challenge.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Seven of Wands indicates that the relationship will end in the long run by succumbing to external pressures or difficulties. You lose the fight.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a resistance that requires constant defense and struggle.

position1.upright: This person is experiencing rapid developments, sudden news or a journey in his life. Events are progressing rapidly. There may be rapid communication or rapid progress in the relationship with you.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Wands indicates delays, obstacles, or misunderstandings in this person's life. Speed ​​may have slowed down and there may be a pause.
position1.context: This person has an energy full of action and communication, like arrows flying quickly towards their target.

position2.upright: A fast, passionate and exciting sexual energy. Events can develop quickly. Passionate messaging, sudden meetings and a high sexual tempo.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Wands indicates a slowdown, delay, or mistiming in sexual energy. Passionate messages may go unanswered or sexual intercourse may be postponed. Jealousy.
position2.context: Your physical connection is an unstoppable energy, like arrows of passion speeding towards their target.

position3.upright: There is a rapid and exciting emotional and spiritual communication between you. Emotions are expressed clearly and quickly. This is a fast-moving, dynamic bond.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Eight of Wands indicates a slowdown, misunderstanding, or delay in emotional communication. You are not on the same frequency spiritually.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is like arrows full of love and passion moving rapidly between two hearts.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a future full of rapid and exciting developments. This could be a sudden marriage proposal, moving in together, or a fast-moving relationship.
position4.reversed: The Eight of Wands reversed indicates that, in the long run, the relationship will end quickly due to poor timing, delays, or jealousy.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is a series of events that will quickly lead you to a happy ending.

position1.upright: This person is a resilient person who has been wounded by past wars but is still standing. He is ready for one last fight and does not let his guard down. Can be cautious and defensive towards relationships.
position1.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that this person no longer has the strength to fight and has given up or has exhausted himself by remaining stubbornly defensive. He may be paranoid.
position1.context: This person is a tired warrior, wounded but undefeated, preparing for one last battle.

position2.upright: A cautious and defensive stance due to past sexual disappointments. A wall may have been erected against sexual intimacy. The desire is there, but action is difficult due to lack of confidence.
position2.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that a sexual defense is no longer effective or has been overcome. Either give up completely or remain stubbornly insecure.
position2.context: Your physical connection is the energy of a warrior who has been hurt in the past and is afraid of being hurt again.

position3.upright: You are cautious and defensive towards each other due to past emotional wounds. There may be a trust issue between you, but there is still resistance to maintain this bond. A spiritual bond that is tired but does not give up.
position3.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that you have emotionally built up your walls even higher or that you no longer have the strength to fight. A spiritual exhaustion.
position3.context: Your emotional attachment is a weary warrior who has been wounded in the past but is still standing.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will continue tired but durable. Despite the wounds of the past, you will not give up on each other. A tiring but lasting bond.
position4.reversed: The Nine of Wands reversed indicates that, in the long run, the relationship will give up at some point due to the insecurities and wounds of the past. Resistance is broken.
position4.context: The fate of this relationship is a tired warrior who manages to survive despite all the wounds.

position1.upright: This person is overwhelmed by too much responsibility and burden. He may be working too hard and trying to do everything on his own. He may not have time or energy to devote to the relationship.
position1.reversed: The Inverted Ten of Wands indicates that this person has let go of the burdens on him, shared the responsibilities, or does not want to carry such a heavy burden anymore. There is relief.
position1.context: This person is someone who has shouldered too much burden to carry alone and is trying to achieve his goal.

position2.upright: Sexual life feels like a duty or burden rather than a source of pleasure. Stress and fatigue suppress libido and sexual desire.
position2.reversed: The Inverted Ten of Wands indicates that a burden or pressure in sexual life is being relieved. Sexual energy can be revived as responsibilities decrease.
position2.context: Your sexual life is an energy that has lost its pleasure and has been crushed under the other burdens of life.

position3.upright: This emotional bond has become a burden or responsibility rather than a pleasure. One or both parties are being crushed under the weight of the relationship. It's mentally exhausting.
position3.reversed: The reversed Ten of Wands indicates that you are starting to let go of the emotional burdens between you. This allows the relationship to lighten up and breathe spiritually.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond has become a heavy burden that is difficult to carry.

position4.upright: In the long run, this relationship will turn into a heavy burden rather than a pleasure. Responsibilities and pressures can destroy love and passion.
position4.reversed: The Inverted Ten of Wands indicates that the relationship will end under this burden in the long run, or that one party will abandon all responsibility.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a heavy responsibility that has become impossible to bear.

position1.upright: This person is a young soul who is adventurous, enthusiastic, energetic and open to new ideas. He likes to explore and try new things. It may bring you an exciting message or a proposal for adventure.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Man of Wands indicates that this person is aimless, indecisive, or unable to make a start. It can bring bad news or disappointment.
position1.context: This person is an energetic and enthusiastic messenger, ready to explore the world with a wand in hand.

position2.upright: An enthusiasm for new sexual experiences and a desire for adventure. A flirtatious, energetic and passionate debut. A sexually exploratory and fun energy.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Man of Wands indicates indecision in making a sexual initiation or immature sexual energy. He has passion but doesn't know where to direct it.
position2.context: Your physical connection is an energetic and passionate explorer, eager to embark on new adventures.

position3.upright: A new passion, excitement and spiritual curiosity is blooming between you. You are eager to discover each other and embark on new adventures together. A fun and energetic bond.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Man of Wands indicates indecision or immature energy in making an emotional debut. There is enthusiasm but no action.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is an enthusiastic and energetic explorer at the beginning of a new adventure.

position4.upright: The long-term result is exploring and having fun, embarking on new adventures together. This is a dynamic relationship that continues with a young and energetic spirit.

position1.upright: This person is passionate, energetic, adventurous and charismatic. He is not afraid to take action and take risks. However, he can sometimes be hasty and impatient. He can come and go from your life in an instant.
position1.reversed: The Knight of Wands reversed indicates that this person is reckless, rude, impatient, or unable to stick to one place. His energy may be scattered and aimless.
position1.context: This person is a passionate and unstoppable adventurer who rides his horse at a gallop.

position2.upright: An extremely passionate, energetic and adventurous sexual connection. A charismatic and seductive energy. Sexually very active and bold.

position3.upright: There is a spiritual bond between you that is passionate, adventurous and energetic. You enjoy taking risks and living in the moment together. However, this can sometimes be unstable.
position3.reversed: The reversed Knight of Wands indicates an emotionally hasty, impatient, or commitment-avoidant dynamic. Passion can flare and fade quickly.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a passionate, exciting, but also unstable relationship. This can be a dynamic that comes and goes, avoiding commitment.

position4.keywords: ["passionate but unstable", "sudden affair", "fear of commitment", "adventure", "quick ending"]

position1.upright: This person is self-confident, popular, energetic, friendly and creative. He is social and likes to be the center of attention. He is a passionate, fun and inspiring partner in a relationship.

position1.upright: This person is faced with the opportunity for a new and concrete start in his life. This could be a new business, investment or a well-established relationship. It can give you a confident, stable start.

position1.upright: This person is a hard worker who demonstrates his talents in a team effort or project. He attaches importance to doing quality work and learning. He/she may see the relationship as a team effort and want to build something together.

position1.upright: This person is someone who attaches extreme importance to financial security, control and savings. Clings tightly to possessions (money, possessions, even relationships). May be closed to change and generosity.

position1.upright: This person is experiencing financial difficulties, exclusion, or health problems. He feels alone and in need of help. He may not see the opportunity for help (or maybe you) nearby.

position1.upright: This person is generous, helpful and financially stable. He knows both how to give and take. In the relationship, he may be a giving and supportive partner, or he may be the one who needs help at the moment.

position3.upright: The bond between you was formed by the coming together of two independent and self-sufficient souls. You just enjoy being together, without needing each other. A mature and elegant emotional bond.
position3.reversed: The Nine of Pentacles reversed indicates that there is an emotional distance or feeling of loneliness between you. Even when you are together, you are spiritually different worlds.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond is two people who respect each other's space, each having their own garden.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a mature and prosperous relationship in which both parties maintain their independence and personal space. You experience the luxury of being together without needing each other.
position4.reversed: The Nine of Pentacles reversed may result in one party becoming financially or spiritually dependent on the other or feeling lonely in the long run.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is an elegant partnership where each has their own garden.

position1.upright: This is someone who values ​​family legacy, traditions, and long-term security. It has a rich infrastructure both materially and spiritually. He may want to build a permanent, stable future and family with you.
position1.reversed: The Ten of Pentacles reversed indicates that this person is experiencing financial problems within the family, has lost an inheritance, or has weak family ties. There is no lasting sense of security.
position1.context: This person represents generational wealth and family ties.

position2.upright: Your physical connection is extremely solid, satisfying and reassuring. This is not just a temporary enthusiasm, but also shows a sensual harmony that can be deep-rooted and permanent. Sexuality provides a sense of home and supports fertility.
position2.reversed: The reversed Ten of Pentacles indicates physical disharmony or instability in sexual life. Skin bonding does not provide the expected trust and satisfaction, or family expectations negatively affect sexual life.
position2.context: Your sexual compatibility is the foundation of a long-term connection and deep-rooted satisfaction.

position3.upright: This is an extremely solid, secure and lasting emotional bond. You are building a spiritual legacy that feels like family and can last for generations. A feeling of deep rooting.
position3.reversed: The reversed Ten of Pentacles indicates that the emotional bond between you is unstable or family problems are disrupting your spiritual harmony. The feeling of security is missing.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a solid and fertile family tree with roots reaching into the future.

position4.upright: The long-term result is an extremely stable, secure and rich family life. This represents building a legacy, starting a family, and happiness that will last for generations.
position4.reversed: The reversed Ten of Pentacles indicates that the relationship will end in the long run due to financial problems or family disagreements. A permanent foundation may not be established.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is to establish a solid and fruitful family tree that will last for generations.

position1.upright: This person is a young soul who is eager to learn, hard-working, reliable and seizes new opportunities. It is focused on a concrete goal. It can offer you a solid and realistic start.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Man of Pentacle indicates that this person is lazy, aimless, or someone who is missing an opportunity. He may have problems in school or work life.
position1.context: This person is a student who examines the amulet in his hand and is eager to learn something new and concrete.

position2.upright: Being open to a new sensual experience or physical discovery. A curious and grounded energy that is eager to learn about sexuality. A solid and slow sexual start.
position2.reversed: The Reversed Man of Pentacle indicates missing a sexual opportunity, laziness, or lack of bodily awareness. An impractical, dreamy approach to sexuality.
position2.context: Your physical connection is like an eager student exploring his or her own body and pleasures.

position3.upright: Your emotional bond blossoms on a solid and realistic basis. You are honest and trustworthy with each other. This is a promising spiritual beginning open to learning and growth.
position3.reversed: The Reversed Servant of Pentacle indicates laziness or reluctance to make an emotional initiation. Spiritual potential is not evaluated.
position3.context: Your spiritual connection is a down-to-earth student who is eager to learn something new.

position4.upright: The long-term result is a promising relationship that grows on a solid and realistic basis. You will continue to learn and develop together.
position4.reversed: The Reversed Man of Pentacle indicates that in the long run an opportunity will be missed or the relationship will go nowhere due to practical problems.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a hopeful sapling growing on solid ground.

position1.upright: This person is extremely reliable, patient, hard-working and methodical. He carries out his duties meticulously. He progresses slowly but surely in love. He is a loyal and stable partner.
position1.reversed: The Knight of Pentacles reversed indicates that this person may be overly boring, stubborn, lazy, or impervious to change. They may be stuck in their routine.
position1.context: This person is a dutiful knight who steps forward slowly but surely.

position2.upright: Your physical connection is slow, patient, reliable and extremely sensual. He is not in a hurry, he focuses on feeling every moment of pleasure. A faithful and stable sexual partner.
position2.reversed: The Knight of Pentacles reversed indicates stagnation, dullness or laziness in sexual life. Sexuality has become a routine rather than an adventure or pleasure.
position2.context: Your sexual energy is a sensual and reliable knight, advancing slowly but surely towards his goal.

position3.upright: There is an emotional bond between you that is extremely loyal, patient and reliable. You show your feelings slowly but surely. It's a stable spiritual partnership that grows stronger over time.
position3.reversed: The reversed Knight of Pentacles indicates emotional stagnation, dullness, or lack of change. The spiritual connection has turned into a routine and lost its excitement.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a knight who is loyal to his duty, slow but never turning back.

position4.upright: The long-term result is an extremely loyal, reliable and stable union. This relationship slowly but surely turns into a lifelong structure.
position4.reversed: The Knight of Pentacles reversed indicates that, in the long run, the relationship will end up falling into a boring routine or resisting change. Progress stops.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is an extremely reliable companion that progresses slowly but steadily.

position1.upright: This person is nurturing, practical, generous and homely. He manages both his home and business successfully. It creates a warm and trusting environment for loved ones. He is a practical and loving partner.
position1.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles reversed indicates that this person is either unable to balance work and home life, or is overly materialistic and anxious. He may not be looking after himself or his surroundings.
position1.context: This person is a down-to-earth motherly soul who offers both material and spiritual wealth.

position2.upright: Sexuality is nurturing, generous, warm and highly sensual. Appeals to all senses (touch, taste, smell). A sensual energy that offers a safe and comfortable environment to its partner.
position2.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles reversed indicates a state of not caring for oneself or one's partner sexually, laziness, or seeing sexual energy only as a practical task. Sensuality is missing.
position2.context: Your sexual life is like a warm and fertile embrace that nourishes all the senses.

position3.upright: The emotional bond between you is nurturing, warm, generous and practical. You support each other both emotionally and practically. It's a reassuring, motherly spiritual embrace.
position3.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles reversed indicates that one party is overly dependent on the other or that emotional needs are overwhelmed by practical considerations. Spiritual nourishment is lacking.
position3.context: Your spiritual bond is a warm and compassionate home that satisfies both your belly and your soul.

position4.upright: The long-term result is to establish a home that is nurturing, warm, safe and comfortable. An extremely generous union where you will take care of each other both materially and spiritually.
position4.reversed: The Queen of Pentacles reversed indicates that in the long run, practical concerns or over-dependence of one party on the other will stifle the relationship.
position4.context: The future of this relationship is a warm and fertile home that nourishes both body and soul.

position1.upright: This person is financially successful, reliable, generous and a stable leader. He established his own empire. He is someone who protects his loved ones and offers a prosperous life.
position1.reversed: The King of Pentacles reversed indicates that this person may be overly materialistic, corrupt, stubborn or insecure. He may abuse his success and wealth.
position1.context: This person is the king of the material world; A successful, reliable and generous leader.

position2.upright: An extremely sensual, generous and adept sexual partner. He is fond of physical pleasures and knows how to please his partner. It provides a rich and satisfying sexual experience.
position2.reversed: The Reversed King of Pentacles can indicate someone who is sexually selfish, lazy, or solely focused on their own pleasure. May use sexuality as a sign of status or power.
position2.context: Your sexual connection is like the generous and masterful ruler of the kingdom of physical pleasures.

position3.upright: There is a spiritual bond between you that is extremely successful, stable and trusting. It's like you've built an empire together. This is a generous partnership based on both material and spiritual wealth.
position3.reversed: The King of Pentacles reversed indicates that the emotional attachment has become overly materialistic or controlling. Love may have become a sign of power or status.
position3.context: Your emotional bond is a kingdom ruled by a wise king who is both rich and generous.

position4.upright: The long-term result is to build a highly successful, wealthy and stable empire. This is a strong and lasting union, prosperous both materially and spiritually.
position4.reversed: The Reversed King of Pentacles indicates that in the long run, materialism or the desire for control will overshadow the love and end the relationship.
position4.context: The destiny of this relationship is a rich and generous kingdom built together.

modals.aboutSpreadText: These 4 cards; It illuminates the person you have in mind, the attraction between you, heart-to-heart harmony, and the long-term direction of the relationship—building a compassionate bridge from today to tomorrow.
modals.cardCountText: (1) The Person You Are Interested In (2) Physical Connection (3) Emotional Connection (4) Long Term Process.
modals.creditConfirmMessage: Credit will be used for this love expansion. Are you sure you want to continue?
modals.detailedReadingText: Take your comment as a warm voice recording. It is specially prepared for you; You can download and listen whenever you want.
modals.loveAttention: After recording the reading, I usually email your personal comment within 2–4 hours. This study is for guidance purposes only; The final choices are yours.
modals.redirecting: 💝 You are redirected to the home page…
modals.step4: Save reading; get the results to your e-mail
modals.successMessage: Your love opening has been recorded and analyzed. You can view the results from the panel.
modals.writtenReadingText: If you prefer, it will be delivered as a detailed written report; You can re-read it whenever you want.

position1.description: The true tone of the person you have in mind, their view of you, their approach, and their intentions. It makes the unsaid visible; It makes you feel what you hold in your heart.
position1.title: Person You Are Interested In

position2.description: The heat of attraction between you, the harmony of your body language and the balance of physical closeness. How energy flows when you are together is revealed here.
position2.title: Physical Connection

position3.description: The heart-to-heart bridge: depth of empathy, trust, and spiritual harmony. The fact that you hear each other and vibrate on the same frequency appears on this card.
position3.title: Emotional Connection

position4.description: The way the relationship matures, the potential to grow together, and the route that time suggests to you. It gives signs about patience, stability and the future picture.
position4.title: Long Term Process

credit.description: Credit will be used to record this reading. Do you want to continue?
credit.title: Credit Approval

position1.context: This person is an adventurer who is ready or afraid to turn a new page in his love life.
position1.reversed: The Reversed Fool indicates that this person may be reckless, irresponsible, or afraid to start a relationship. He or she may be ignoring potential dangers and avoiding attachment.
position1.upright: The person you are attracted to is full of childlike curiosity and excitement about life. He has an adventurous spirit, open to new beginnings, but this can sometimes cause him to be unplanned and unscheduled. He approaches relationships with this free spirit.
